original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
20.3. Āsavagocchaka
Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca
